      • lightLocalize

        public void lightLocalize()
        This method is implemented to let the robot first detect 4 black lines in order to detect four angles using these four angles to get a and b then get x and y to move forward

      • advanceRobot

        public void advanceRobot(double distanceToTravel,
                boolean instantReturn)
        Advances the robot a desired amount of cm.
        Parameters:
        distanceToTravel - : Distance to travel in cm.
        instantReturn - : True if the function is to be instantly returned. False if the function is to be returned after the travel is completed.
